rooms.description: Spacious living room with natural light and a connection to the garden through large windows.
Modern kitchen with ample storage space, keeping Vastu principles in mind for placement of appliances and cabinets.
Dining room connected to the kitchen with a view of the garden through a sliding glass door.
Well-lit guest bathroom with modern fixtures.
